c74object.name: tap.inquisitor
c74object.digest: Interrogate another object about its attributes.
c74object.description: The tap.inquisitor object can interrogate a named object in the same patcher as itself to find out what attributes are present, and the values of those attributes.

attribute.name: name
attribute.description: The name of the object to interrogate. The named object must be in the same patcher as the tap.inquisitor object.
